title: DevkitServer Configuration (Client)
description: Defines general client-side settings for DevkitServer.

ansi_log.description: Add a log to Unturned/Logs that includes whatever visual ANSI codes are used to color the console.

extended_visual_ansi_support.description: Full (24-bit) console color support (works in the Win 11 terminal and most web terminals).

visual_ansi_support.description: Basic (4-bit) console color support (works in most terminals).

enable_object_ui_extension.description: Enables a preview window for your selected object in the Object Editor.

enable_better_map_creation.description: Enables an override for better initial map creation (adding a new map).
